I don't think it's the wrong place xD but basically as far as I can tell there aren't any cheats in dmc, but there are unlockables such as costumes etc... (if I'm wrong tell me!)

If you want to go beyond the game and to "break the rules" and get a different gaming experience which would go beyond the classical game I think the best choice would to give the PC mods a try Both dmc 3 and 4 are available for PC, so like every PC game you can modify the content as you will if you know a few tricks, and if you don't you can always use stuff made by other people. You can find a lot of them here: http://s1.zetaboards.com/InfernalWorks/index/

(we also have a DMC4 modding section on our forum but since you didn't mention this game and there aren't any mods that you can use yet I thought re-directing you outside the forum was a better idea)

Copied from GFAQS (note some cheats disable saving/trophies)

DMC2

Dante and Lucia's Diesel Costume

Play the First Mission and Save. Restart your game and at the ''Press Start Button Screen'', Press L3, R3, L1, R1, L2, R2, L3, R3. If you did it right, then you should hear a sound. Now select ''Load Game'' and you should be able to pick the Diesel Costume for whichever character you did the code for by Pressing R1 or L1 on the Load Screen.

Infinite DT in Bloody Palace

select BP while holding R2,L2,R1,L1

DMC3

Unlock Everything

To unlock everything in the game (including game play modes, character costumes, galleries, etc) enter this code at the title screen.

EffectCode

Unlocks Everything Hold R1 + R2 + L1 + L2 + D-pad Up/Left + Left Analog-stick Down/Right
